name: The Treasured Ship
description:
Explore a ship looking for your father's long-lost treasure. Solve puzzles, find clues, and decipher riddles as you venture into the depths of the ship!

This was my first Unity game, and was made for a final class project, so I would love any feedback! I'm estimating that the game should take about 15-30 minutes to play.

How to Play:

  • WASD: Move
  • Mouse: Look around
  • Click: Interact with objects
  • Spacebar: Jump (handy for climbing ladders)
  • Esc: Pause/Help Menu
  • Q: Toggle camera rotation (great for puzzles)
  • C: Toggle cursor position (keep in center or let it move freely)
  • The cursor will light up red when it's over an object that can be interacted with in some way (ie. it can be picked up, an inventory item can be used with it, or it can be activated in some way). A blue cursor means the object cannot be interacted with.
